poem:
### Silent Testament

In the shadow of charred towers,  
ghosts whisper in the wind.  
Walls of sorrow hold stories  
voiced only by silence.  
Feet trace paths of memory,  
each step a pulse of grief.  
Fire's cruel kiss lingers,  
but resilience speaks loud  
in the breath of the living.  
Time shall erase the stone,  
but not the echo of our loss.
